readable.title: 2591486448_48d5438343
readable.content: A brown dog is wanting food from a plate held by a person . A brown dog looking at a plate with food , someone 's hand taking from it . A brown dog resting his head on the lap of a person who is eating some food . A dog 's head is in the lap of a person eating off a small plate . The brown dog with the red collar is staring at the plate of food .
